name: Looter's Handbook
description: Chests' appearance matches the treasure they hold: purple chests have progression and items green chests have useful items. WARNING: Traps can be in chests of any color.

description: Allows you to use the explore ability for: Spectral Wolf, Spectral Toad, Spectral Eagle, Spectral Lion

name: Progressive Mobility
description: Unlocks Flying -> Improved Flying -> Swimming -> Improved Swimming -> Dual Mobility

name: Progressive Terrain
description: Unlocks Grapple -> Blob Form / Morph Ball -> Secret Vision

name: Progressive Mount
description: Unlocks Mount -> Charging Mount / Tar Mount -> Lofty Mount

name: Progressive Walls
description: Unlocks Claws / Slash / Heavy Punch / Tackle -> Crush / Light Crush -> Minnesang

name: Progressive Boulders
description: Unlocks Summon Rock / Summon Mushroom -> Summon Big Rock -> Levitate

name: Progressive Fire Orbs
description: Unlocks Ignite -> Fiery Shots

name: Progressive Water Orbs
description: Unlocks Bubble Burst -> Corrosive Jabs

name: Progressive Lightning Orbs
description: Unlocks Lightning Bolt -> Shock Freeze

name: Progressive Earth Orbs
description: Unlocks Toxic Slam -> Slime Shot / Jewel Blast -> Toxic Freeze

name: Progressive Ice Orbs
description: Unlocks Freeze -> Snowball Toss

name: Progressive Light
description: Unlocks Light / Sonar -> Sonar Mount

name: Progressive Shroud
description: Unlocks Ghost Form -> Spore Shroud

name: Combo Flight
description: Unlocks Flying -> Improved Flying. Required to unlock Grapple, Lofty Mount, and Dual Mobility

name: Combo Swimming
description: Unlocks Swimming -> Improved Swimming. Required to unlock Tar Mount and Dual Mobility

name: Combo Walls
description: Unlocks Claws / Slash -> Crush -> Minnesang. Required to unlock Tackle, Corrosive Jabs, Toxic Slam, Charging Mount, and Light Crush

name: Combo Boulders
description: Unlocks Summon Rock / Summon Mushroom -> Summon Big Rock. Requried to unlock Tackle and Levitate

name: Combo Mount
description: Unlocks Mount. Required to unlock Sonar Mount, Tar Mount, Charging Mount, and Lofty Mount

name: Combo Light
description: Unlocks Light / Sonar. Required to unlock Sonar Mount and Light Crush

name: Combo Orbs
description: Unlocks Ignite / Bubble Burst / Lightning Bolt / Freeze -> Fiery Shots / Jewel Blast / Slime Shot / Snowball Toss -> Shock Freeze / Toxic Freeze. Required for Corrosive Jabs and Toxic Slam

name: Combo Shroud
description: Unlocks Ghost Form -> Spore Shroud

name: Combo Magic
description: Unlocks Blob Form / Morph Ball -> Secret Vision. Requried to unlock Levitate
